en.line: 'OK, back to work!'

en.line: About the same time, Ageha, who had been to the\nRobotics Club for a while, came back and said\n'Alright, here we go!

As she says that, she seems a little lost as to
how to eat it, and looking round at everyone
else, she copies the way we do it and takes a big
bite.

en.line: That's just so incredible, it feels really\nmysterious.

en.line: 'Whoa... listening to your story, An-chan, has\nmade me feel all tingly!'

jp.line: 「うー、あんちゃんの話聞いてたら、\n　うずいてきちゃった！」

jp.line: 「はぐはぐもぐもぐ……ごくん！\n　おおー！」

en.line: 'Let's get this baby flying!'

en.line: 'Yeah!'
en.name: Kotori

jp.line: 「うん！」
jp.name: 小鳥

en.line: 'There's a good mood about the place.'

jp.line: 「いい雰囲気じゃないか」

en.line: 'Yeah. It feels just like old times, right?'

jp.line: 「ああ。\n　まるで、あの頃に戻ったみたいだろう？」

en.line: '...It sure does.'

jp.line: 「……そうだな」

jp.line: 「……ああ、いいんじゃないか」

en.line: 'An-chan, look at this.'

jp.line: 「あんちゃん、こっちも見てよ」

en.line: 'OK, hold on.'

jp.line: 「おお、待ってろ」
jp.name: 達也
